entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a character who has come to ask Dumbledore for permission to return to the castle and teach. He claims to have seen and done much since leaving the place.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who is being asked by Voldemort for permission to return to the castle and teach. He seems to be aware of Voldemort's actions and rumors about him.

relationships.description: Voldemort requests Dumbledore for permission to return to the castle and teach.
Rumors about Voldemort's actions have reached his old school.
